data.title: mtu Indoor Football Cup attracts an array of footballing talent
data.meta_description: FC Barcelona, FC Basel, Borussia Dortmund, FC Bayern Munich and VfB Stuttgart - with a host of top youth teams lining up to take part, the MTU Indoor Cup promises to be a veritable feast of football.
data.text:
24 national and international clubs invited to U15 tournament

Tognum core brand mtu is main sponsor of Indoor Cup

Friedrichshafen, 2 December 2011. FC Barcelona, FC Basel, Borussia Dortmund, FC Bayern Munich and VfB Stuttgart - with a host of top youth teams lining up to take part, the mtu Indoor Cup promises to be a veritable feast of football. On the weekend of December 10 and 11, some 17 international and national U15 sides along with seven local teams will compete against one another at Friedrichshafen's Bodenseesporthalle (Lake Constance Sports Center). Local club VfB Friedrichshafen is hosting the tournament, while the main sponsor is mtu - the core brand of the Tognum Group.

"Our long-standing involvement highlights our close ties with the town of Friedrichshafen. We also want to encourage young people who display passion, resolve, professionalism and team spirit in pursuing their goals because these are characteristics that also play an important role within our company," explains Joachim Coers, Chairman of the Executive Board at Tognum AG and CEO at MTU Friedrichshafen GmbH.

â€žAn event like the mtu Indoor Football Cup just wouldn't happen without the sponsors and benefactors, not to mention the tireless work of numerous voluntary helpers. We are delighted to have had a number of strong partners behind the scenes for a number of years," says Klaus Segelbacher from the football section at VfB Friedrichshafen.

Sides taking part in the mtu Indoor Cup 2011 include the youth teams from FC Barcelona, FC Everton, FC Bayern Munich, FC Basel 1893, Borussia Dortmund, Dynamo Zagreb, VfB Stuttgart, Rapid Vienna, Schalke 04, Sparta Prague, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim, Aarhus GF, FSV Mainz 05, Ferencvaros Budapest, FK Olimpik Sarajevo and 1. FC Kaiserslautern. The regional youth teams participating are from the mtu Leistungszentrum, VfB Friedrichshafen, TSG Ailingen, SG Kluftern/Immenstaad, SG Kehlen/Meckenbeuren, VfL Brochenzell and SG Fischbach/Schnetzenhausen

The mtu Indoor Cup is being held on the second weekend in December at Friedrichshafen's Bodenseesporthalle . The first round of matches gets underway at 8.30 on the Saturday morning, with the second round and final round taking place from 8.30 onwards on the Sunday morning. Further information about the mtu Indoor Cup is available online at www.mtu-hallencup.de or on the new mtu Indoor cup Facebook page www.facebook.com/mtuhallencup.
